body:
Come to Avicus TS and join Chat #2 and then in about 25 minutes you will be poked with more information. It will be on an OCN 1.8 scrim server.

Thank you

title: MEGA SCRIM IN 30 MINUTES

replies.body: Could you wait like 15 mins for me after 10:30am? Need to take my brother to karate.

replies.body: Aparently I am the 10 year old squeaker who cries if we loose. I am totally not offended
